title: Lemon mascarpone cheesecake
ingredients: ['175g (6 oz) digestive or amaretti biscuits', '75g (3 oz) unsalted butter', '400g (14 oz) mascarpone cheese', 'grated zest of 3 unwaxed lemons', 'juice of 1 lemon', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs, separated', '2 level tablespoons of cornflour', '1 small pinch of salt', 'Optional', 'icing sugar for dusting', 'raspberries and strawberries']
